RLM + Whale.description: RLM + at least one whale trade

implementation_spec.entry_logic:
def detect_rlm_signal(market_trades):
    '''
    Detect RLM signal from trade stream.

    Returns True if:
    1. >65% of trades are YES bets
    2. YES price dropped (last < first)
    3. At least 15 trades
    '''
    if len(market_trades) < 15:
        return False

    yes_trades = sum(1 for t in market_trades if t.taker_side == 'yes')
    yes_ratio = yes_trades / len(market_trades)

    if yes_ratio <= 0.65:
        return False

    first_yes_price = market_trades[0].yes_price
    last_yes_price = market_trades[-1].yes_price

    if last_yes_price >= first_yes_price:
        return False

    return True

signal_combinations.recommended: Base RLM alone shows strong edge
signal_combinations.enhancement: RLM + S013 (low leverage variance) may provide additional confirmation
